sent.orig: Will Lamar Odom score enough (shoot enough take the ballthe hole enough) for a No.2 option?
sent.trans: 奥多姆得分够吗（出手够多，命中更多），成为球队2号得分手？

sent.orig: Enough is Enough, Enough Hypocrisy for This One World.
sent.trans: 够了够了，这同一个世界已够虚伪。

sent.orig: Moderation is a fatal things. Enough is asas meal. More than enough is asas a feast.
sent.trans: 差不多是最要不得的事情，做到足够好像吃白米饭，做的比足够要多就好像是满汉全席了。

sent.orig: It is not enough to wait patiently until enough people oppose slavery to outlaw it.
sent.trans: 耐心等待，直到有足够多的人反对奴隶制，最终在法律上取缔它，这样做是不够的。

sent.orig: I don't mind good, clean fun, but enough is enough.
sent.trans: 我并不介意有趣、健康的玩笑，但要适可而止。
